Package com.bomber7.utils

Class PlayerBlueprintObservable

java.lang.Object
com.bomber7.utils.PlayerBlueprintObservable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject
public class PlayerBlueprintObservable extends Object implements Subject
Observable wrapper of PlayerBlueprint. It was created to allow a null value for a playerBlueprint (= not added), which was needed to implement UI logic in PlayerSelector

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PlayerBlueprintObservable()
    Constructor that initializes a null playerBlueprint instance.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(String name)
      Used to create a valid instance of PlayerBlueprint with a given name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player.

    • getPlayerBlueprint

      public PlayerBlueprint getPlayerBlueprint()
      Returns the playerBlueprint held by this observable.
      Returns:
      playerBlueprint of this observable

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Wrapper of PlayerBlueprint.setName(String). It does not notify its observers when changed because no UI objects are linked to the player's name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to set.

    • setStrategy

      public void setStrategy(PlayerStrategy strategy)
      Wrapper of PlayerBlueprint.setStrategy(PlayerStrategy). Notifies its observers when called.
      Parameters:
      strategy - the strategy to set.

    • setCharacter

      public void setCharacter(GameCharacter character)
      Wrapper of PlayerBlueprint.setCharacter(GameCharacter). Notifies its observers when called.
      Parameters:
      character - the skin (character) to set.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Wrapper of PlayerBlueprint.getName().
      Returns:
      the name of the player.

    • getStrategy

      public PlayerStrategy getStrategy()
      Wrapper of PlayerBlueprint.getStrategy().
      Returns:
      the strategy of the player.

    • getCharacter

      public GameCharacter getCharacter()
      Wrapper of PlayerBlueprint.getCharacter().
      Returns:
      the skin (character) of the player.

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Disposed the linked PlayerBlueprint instance (sets it to null).

    • isDisposed

      public boolean isDisposed()
      Checks whether the player blueprint has been disposed.
      Returns:
      true if the player blueprint is disposed (= null), false otherwise.

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Checks whether the player blueprint is valid.
      Returns:
      true if the player blueprint is valid (not disposed and has an unlocked character), false otherwise.

    • notifyChanged

      public void notifyChanged()
      Marks this observable as changed and notifies all of its observers.

      public List<Observer> getObservers()
      Description copied from interface: Subject
